channel.title: The Project on Communities of social science
channel.description: Recent content in The Project on Communities of social science

item.title: Louvain Modularity
item.description: Louvain Modularity # We optimize modularity based on the Louvian Partition Algorithm, which is: \[ \Delta M=\left[\frac{\sum_{in}+2k_{i,in}}{2W} - \left(\frac{\sum_{tot}+k_{i}}{2W}\right)^2 \right] - \left[\frac{\sum_{in}}{2W} - \left(\frac{\sum_{tot}}{2W}\right)^2 - \left(\frac{k_{i}}{2W}\right)^2 \right] \] Is used to make these networks
